text: Interested in helping but not sure where to start? We have a very approachable issue just for you. https://t.co/Yc6Y4qOwEZ @yourfirstpr #µ
We've set up our Slack channels.  Drop by and say hi! https://t.co/D6O2U9TssT
Microbe 0.4.12 has been released including appendTo and prependTo https://t.co/UcMChRmhF0
Easily check if they used the inputs correctly with µ( 'input:in-range' ) and µ( 'input:out-of-range' ) #css4 #µ #microbejs
Need to see which of those divs are those drop points? Use the drop selector µ( 'div:drop' ) #css4 #µ #microbejs
#css4 contains an improvement on the css1 descendent selector whitespace. µ( 'ul li' ) becomes µ( 'ul >> li' ) #µ #microbejs
Did they fill out the entire form?  If they did, the length µ( 'input:blank' ) will be 0 #css4 #µ #microbejs
Using multiple direction languages on the same page? Easily select them with the direction selector. µ( 'div:dir(ltr)' ) #µ #microbejs #css4
Match children with the relational selector 'has'.  Make sure you picked the right div! µ( 'div:has( .suceess )' ) #µ #microbejs #css4
Quickly sort the editable field in your page with µ( ':read-only' ) and µ( ':read-write' ) #µ #microbejs #css4
It'll be a lot easier to check your input validation with µ( 'input:required' ) and µ( 'input:optional' ) #µ #microbejs #css4
All those links on your page, and you only want the ones to your page? Use local-link! µ( ':local-link' ) #µ #microbejs #css4
How about matching more than one selector option? #css4 has you covered there too! µ( 'div:matches( .class1, .class2 )' ) #µ #microbejs
Need to exclude more than one class from your selection? #css4 has you covered! µ( 'div:not( .class1, .class2 )' ) #µ #microbejs
How do you select the default elements from all your inputs?  Easy!  Try the defalult selector! µ( 'input:default' )  #µ #microbejs #css4
Need to deal with only the english elements?  Try the language selector with wildcards! µ( ':lang(*-en)' ) #µ #microbejs #css4
The parent selector (!) selects it's direct parent. Let's select an input's label µ( 'input! label' ) #µ #microbejs #css4
Have you ever met the new #css4 pseudo-selectors? Microbe wants to introduce you! #µ #microbejs https://t.co/OSbahgjJrv
RT @SaltineJustine: Contributing to OSS isn't as scary as it might seem — https://t.co/mpsJsMqDsb

npm install microbejs

or

bower install microbejs

npm i microbejs
or
bower install microbejs
